commit message: Initial commit
licence and codeStyle
Cloning and updating gitignore.
SplashScreen uses the root cow now
fixed stackoverflow issue by painting sequentiell actions iterative
tutorial test
improved zooming abilitied
Turned debuggable on.
Orientation-based ActionTree-drawing is done during the actual drawing not while traversing the tree.
ActionTree works again
implemented zoom for the ActionTree and made maximum of SudokuLayout depend on sudoku size
Prepared App for debugging after preparing it for release. (debuggable=true)
We now have a README
Fixed a mistake in the README
Updated README
fixed issues 89, 90
Regression Test for Issue-90
Regression Test for Issue-89
splashscreen does not freeze when screen is locked any more (issue #96)
Added test-robotium to .gitignore
Removed test-robotium from .gitignore
splashscreen is always presented in portrait orientation now (issue #98)
added a time representation of used assistances in the UI (issue #94)
added the french translation for the assistances cost display tutorial entry
added the function 'go to last bookmark'
fixed a bug that caused the surrender function not to cause a null score
fixed a bug that caused the actionTree to be centered on top of the display after changing display orientation (issue #87)
removed the GET_ACCOUNTS-permission and therefor added a default name for the initial profile
ingame layout is more generic now (no fixed-size input area), optimized for tablets
restored old status bar size, new one was too big for smartphones
action tree margins in landscape mode are correct now (fixed issue #101)
fixing OutOfMemoryError in SudokuLoading now (issue #105)

Changed version name in AndroidManifest to from '1.0.2' to '1.0.4'. Currend version is already called '1.0.3' -> next one will be 1.0.4
Changed project name of sudoq-model from 'sudoqModel' to 'sudoq-model'. This fixes errors occuring when workspace is not the repository
start to refactor by establishing abstract class for the runnables
Further refactorings

Shortcut for generation of standard sudokus commented out
reasons:
it's always the same sudoku generated and just transformed. This is conceptually wrong! After transform count * 10 all Sudokus stem from one basic sudoku (that again suffers from the bug pointed out by remaxim)
updated all 9x9templates, but did not check yet! 16x16 is very slow -> search for better algorithm?
created 16x16 templates, unchecked. Threads seem to be nonterminating, current fix: startt more than needed => investigate \n update! all new templates checked
all formerly wrong template-sudokus checked
replaced 'finished' in Loading with a symbol
removed obsolete(automatic) Todos
displays now hours and days in gametime
clear up experiment
forgot to save. now 'finished' in loading is a checkmark
resolving warnings about unused imports, static access
updated robotium.jar, fixed robotium tests

Merge pull request #108 from peervalhoegen/smallfixes

Smallfixes

adjusted copyDirectory: existing files will be overritten. changed order of copying: standard-sudoku9x9 should be copied first now
refactored template-initialization/update

implemented ActionBar
